column5: Just a heads up for those who like video tips on various fishing tricks and use of equipment The guys at TNB ,pete,gary and keith put together an impressive library  http://www.thenextbite.com/videos
go to bed....   Dude spring coming......... means only one thing False spawning runs
Thankyou.  A little over a month and i should have my boat out.
one of the reasons it's my favorite show,,,have some of the best informative segments on tv!

Hey Marc, that's good stuff.   What I really want to see are the outtakes from the 2 Best Days of Muskie Fishing Ever.  I just watched that one and it brought back some good (and crazy) memories from the 3 days just before that.    Reel Mfr, Reel!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Add our last day and those 3 days were crazy.
and what kind of false  spawning runs are we talking about.................
Reel my friend, reel! I remember that like it was yesterday  I think the Dawson man is about ready to do a no holds barred musky trip. That really would be great yanno.
Marc "go to bed".... the bugger gets up at that ridiculous hour !  Or were you up bud looking into some AD?
I think about it all the time Roy.   Not sure he's ever come home, or even to Ontario again if I make the trip to Montreal.
Funny to see you put this up now Marc, I just watched the episode with and the guys chasing muskies today.  Thanks for the link.  Definitely one of the best shows out there.
Thanks Marc I don't have access to WFN so watching on the net is appreciated.  So far I have looked at alot of video for walleye.

Hey Marty,ya I can remember that moment,best part is watching Captain Ed keep his boys in line! Good times and great laughs Dont be afraid !  Wayne,Your right I do get up early,someone has the turn the lights on for the rest of you's Lew cant do it all alone A.D,sure its  Always Daytime I was gonna reply " I am in bed,YOURS!"  Hey Ben,they do put together good tips  GB,its called practice runs Your right about my ice fishing capabilities,I went Ice fishing yesterday,ya know what I suck It was a nice day and warm
Can't ask for more than that!!.....well....maybe a Dinner fish or two. I'd be nice seeing as how you let all yours go all the time.... Sounds like ya enjoyed yourself anyways.
hey-at least we got ONE perch.Can't call that a skunk!
